external_games.name: Taken Souls: Blood Ritual Collector's Edition

name: Taken Souls: Blood Ritual - Collector's Edition
summary: A series of mysterious ritual murders covered the foggy streets of London, which young detective James Voodoo will have to investigate. While investigating these mysterious murders, James Voodoo faces the mystical phenomena, which covered the city. When progressing in case investigation, James realizes that these murders are just the small part of the global conspiracy, which threatens the whole world. And he is the only one who can stop it.
